RESPONSIBILITY

DAYTIME OPERATOR

WEEKLY

MONTHLY

BI- ANNUALLY (June & December)

-
-

-
-
-

Please ensure that the blue cloth is always used for food contact surfaces when wiping down as per Master Cleaning Schedule above.
If the Blue Cloth does get contaminated with grease, dirt and/or other lubricants, please discard of immediately and issue a new one to use on
surfaces.
Ensure that frames of machines, surfaces of trim unit, cooling  unit and rails where excess grease may be, must be wiped down with a rag.
No Blue Cloths to be used for wiping of grease, and other lubricants.

No Rags can be used for any food contact surfaces.

Controlled Copy

Order

Initial

TEMPORARY REPAIRS/MODIFICATIONS
All temporary repairs must be corrected within 14 days of “Temporary Repair” Maintenance Job Card being opened.
Complete table below together with “Temporary Repair” Maintenance Job Card including the post maintenance hygiene clearance being done.

-
-

-
-
-

Please ensure that the blue cloth is always used for food contact surfaces when wiping down as per Master Cleaning Schedule above.
If the Blue Cloth does get contaminated with grease, dirt and/or other lubricants, please discard of immediately and issue a new one to use on
surfaces.
Ensure that frames of machines, surfaces of trim unit, cooling  unit and rails where excess grease may be, must be wiped down with a rag.
No Blue Cloths to be used for wiping of grease, and other lubricants.

No Rags can be used for any food contact surfaces.

Please ensure that the blue cloth is always used for food contact surfaces when wiping down as per Master Cleaning Schedule above.
If the Blue Cloth does get contaminated with grease, dirt and/or other lubricants, please discard of immediately and issue a new one to use on
surfaces.
Ensure that frames of machines, surfaces of trim unit, cooling  unit and rails where excess grease may be, must be wiped down with a rag.
No Blue Cloths to be used for wiping of grease, and other lubricants.

No Rags can be used for any food contact surfaces.
